pr_title: [RW:4719][RISK=NO] Create workspace: indicate what will be made public

timeline.message: Create workspace: indicate what will be made public

timeline.bodyText: Thank you for this! I'll remove future instances of All of Us as I run in to them.
timeline.author: als364

timeline.bodyText: nitpick: can you do this by saying indent={true} publiclyDisplayed={true} instead ?
timeline.author: als364

timeline.bodyText: Can we use this above, in the AouTitle element?
timeline.author: s-rubenstein

replies.bodyText: Also, weird nit: If we use AouTitle above, we should probably have this one be Aou? Just for consistency of capitalization? (As much as I don't like it because it is an acronym and we italicize it as AoU in text in english)
replies.author: s-rubenstein

replies.bodyText:
Yeah so because we are using AouTitle for Research Program (which should be technically AoUResearchProgram) thats why i am going with AoU.
@blrubenstein  will it be ok to use AoU here as of now and have another PR to change AouTitle to AouResearchTitle and this as AouTitle? I will be using that PR to replace  All of Us  used in codes to AouTitle
replies.author: NehaBroad

timeline.bodyText: There's a missing space here. (look at the screenshot. I think the space after the is missing.)
